subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Frank's Box # 37
author: Pridegrl Neverumind
full_text:

Frank-
   
  if your intuition ever decided to send a box my way- I would NOT be so rude as to return-to-sender.......    ;)
  hehe
  Charm

"Fransen, Debbie" <debbie.fransen@...> wrote:
            Who would have thunk that we still don't make sense after we die ??? Ha Ha
  Frank, does your intuition tell you that an honest, truly interested,
  and inspired person named Debbie F should have one ??????
  Just let me know if that every happens. I will be waiting with anticipation.....
   
  In all seriousness  Frank, we all know that you can't possibly build one for every
  researcher out here.  That would be nice, but not realistic...
   
  We just appreciate you spending your time sharing your findings with us.....
  And your messages.....
   
  Thanks
   

    
---------------------------------
  From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of purplespacefriend
Sent: Tuesday, May 20, 2008 5:59 PM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Frank's Box # 37


  
    Wellll, it's kinda based on ituition. It just seemed like April was 
supposed to have one. If that makes any sense. I can't make this 
stuff for everyone that requests one, and yet "they" insist I keep 
making making boxes for people. 

Frank-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Fransen, Debbie" 
<debbie.fransen@...> wrote:
>
> I thought that Frank wasn't giving or selling any boxes.
> 
> ________________________________
> 
> From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On 
Behalf
> Of April Slaughter
> Sent: Monday, May 19, 2008 3:13 PM
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Frank's Box # 37
> 
> 
> 
> Frank's Box # 37 along with two sound chambers arrived today. Thank
> you Frank. You put so much time and effort into these devices, not 
to
> mention 'heart'. You have a big one, and it is appreciated greatly.
> 
> April
>
